carbonDioxide.description:
The CO2 level is an indicator of air quality. A high level can cause headaches, fatigue and a decrease in concentration.

It is recommended to ventilate the workspace when the CO2 level exceeds 1000 ppm.
carbonDioxide.label: CO2 level

level.excessive: No choice: windows need to be opened ü•¥
level.unknown: The level could not be retrieved ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è

climate.description: The room's atmosphere is monitored in real time to ensure your comfort.
climate.label: Atmosphere

deckDoor.description: This door directly leads to the deck, and can be opened from the exterior to enter the workspace.
deckDoor.label:
Unlock
the deck door
deckDoor.missingCapability:
Unlocking the door requires a little bit of seniority.
You will be able to do so once you have accumulated 10 days of activity.

empty.description: What do you want to manage if there is nothing to do?
empty.title: Chaos

flexDesk.description:
This sit-stand desk allows you to work sitting or standing, depending on your preferences.
It is available without reservation, with a real-time status to check if it is occupied or free.
flexDesk.label: Sit-stand desk

keyBox.description:
The key box allows you to retrieve the shared office keys and:
- open it when you are the first to arrive,
- close it when you are the last to leave.

It is located next to the entrance door and a code is required to open it.
keyBox.label: Open the key box
keyBox.missingCapability:
Opening the key box requires a bit of seniority.
You will be able to do it once you have accumulated 10 days of activity.

onFetch.fail: Unable to retrieve on premise state

phoneBooths.description:
Phone booths are isolated spaces intended for short calls.
They are equipped with electrical outlets and ventilation.
They are not reservable and are accessible to all.
phoneBooths.label: Phone Booths
